title: Alphabet Pillow
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080711063529im_/http:/typophile.com/files/bird-abcs-white-for-website_3446.jpg)

I’m thinking it’s based on Palatino. Any thoughts?

Found on [BabyGadget](http://web.archive.org/web/20080711063529/http:/www.babygadget.net/2008/01/pillows_from_deseta.php).

 [‹ Here is a hard one.....good luck to anyone who can figure it out.....and thanks](http://web.archive.org/web/20080711063529/http:/typophile.com/node/41180 "Go to previous forum topic") [Name of the Chanel Font or closest match? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080711063529/http:/typophile.com/node/41182 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Ehague

comments.content: If it’s based on anything it is more like a modern slab serif like Caecilia.
